cab.content: His Britannic fvtejesty'3 Cov^r: - - ^g E C R.. ,f-BATTLE SITUATION - EVENING - 28th- APRIL, 1918.1, The situation at LOCRE is not yet entirely cleared-up. The French think they hold the village, whilst the enemy claims to have taken it *2, Our outpost line North of VOORMEZEELE now runs Lock SWHITE CHATEAU, with main line of resistance on CANAL BANK from YPRES Northwards *3. There is nothing to report from remainder ofthe front.General Staff,War Office, ScWolo28th April, 1918 0Issued at 6*45 pern.919
